thread.title: Thankful in Washington
thread.title_full: Intoxalock reviewed by Thankful in Washington

author: Thankful in Washington
title: Thankful in Washington
text: Jeff was very helpful getting me set up with an Intoxalock account and finding me an inexpensive option for device installation. His friendly disposition helped to put me at ease during what was initially a stressful phone call, and he was knowledgeable about the questions I had regarding the ignition-interlock license application process in my state. Thanks, Jeff!
